name: ROCK REGIONAL HOSPITAL
sampleDescriptions: I will be lobbying for RRH to get 88% of the revenue it lost due the Covid pandemic funded by HHS' Provider Relief Fund. They were unable to provide relevant documentation to HHS for Phase 3 PRF fundi
